gallery.title: Play Ground
gallery.description: A playground, playpark, or play area is a place designed to provide an environment for children that facilitates play, typically outdoors.

gallery.title: Indoor Area
gallery.description: Indoor Area means all space between a floor and a ceiling that is bounded by walls, doorways, or windows, whether open or closed.

gallery.title: Outdoor Area
gallery.description: Outdoor area means an area, whether or not enclosed by a roof, which is open to the elements, and which is not constructed for year round use.
